    • validateMovie

      public static boolean validateMovie(Movie movie) throws ValidationException
      Validates a Movie object.
      Parameters:
      movie - The Movie object to be validated.
      Returns:
      True if the Movie is valid, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      ValidationException - If the Movie details are not valid.
